cn.title: 关于防范 "冒充比特派 Line 客服" 的声明

message.data: 近期，有用户反馈，被在 Line 上冒充比特派客服的骗子诱导至 eth-bit.com 这个诈骗网站，要求用户存入资产并许诺高额回报，当用户存入资产后，骗子将资产冻结，要求存入更多资产方可解冻。
比特派钱包无任何 Line 账户，所有在 Line 上冒充比特派客服的都是骗子。
请大家一定注意此类风险，切勿轻信陌生人推荐的高收益项目，以免造成资产损失。

en.title: Statement on preventing fake Bitpie customer support on Line chat

message.data: Recently, some users reported that they were induced by scammers claiming to be Bitpie customer service on Line chat to a scam website, eth-bit.com, requiring users to deposit assets and promising high yield returns. When users deposit assets, scammers will freeze the assets and require more assets to be deposited to unfreeze.
Bitpie Wallet does not have any Line account, and all those who pretend to be Bitpie customer service on Line are scammers.
Please pay attention to anyone claimed to be Bitpie support and do not trust high-yield projects recommended by strangers, so as to avoid asset losses.
